name: shore-up
effect: Heals the user for ½ its max HP. During a sandstorm, the healing is increased to ⅔.
short_effect: Heals the user for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ during a sandstorm.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP in a sandstorm.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP in a sandstorm.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP in a sandstorm.
